did.unittitle: Henry Serrano Villard typescript : Red Cross driver in Italy : a memoir of the First World War
did.abstract: Relates to the American Red Cross ambulance service in Italy during World War I and to Villard's acquaintanceship with the writer Ernest Hemingway in the ambulance service. Appendices include rosters of Red Cross personnel in Italy and a copy of a 1918 article by Hemingway in a Red Cross bulletin.

chronitem.event: Served as volunteer ambulance driver for the Red Cross in Italy. Met Ernest Hemingway while both were recuperating in a Red Cross hospital
Served as US representative to the European Office of the United Nations
Served as ambassador to Mali, Senegal, and Mauritania
